ckd.name: Correct coding of CKD diagnosis
ckd.description:
Patients with correct coding of CKD (Stage 3 or above) based on eGFR and ACR readings as specified in NICE guidance.
Eligible patients: patients with a CKD diagnostic code (stage 3 or above) or eGFR readings persistently < 60 ml/min/1.73m2 who do not have a QOF exclusion code.
Correct patients: patients who have a diagnostic code matching their latest eGFR and/or ACR readings.

undiagnosed.name: Undiagnosed
undiagnosed.description: Patients who have CKD stage 3 or above according to their latest eGFR and ACR readings but who do not have a CKD diagnosis code in their record

overdiagnosed.name: Overdiagnosed
overdiagnosed.description: Patients who have a CKD diagnostic code in their record but their latest eGFR readings do not meet the criteria for CKD diagnosis stage 3 or above

suggestExclude.name: Suggest Exclude
suggestExclude.description: Patients who have a CKD stage 3 or above diagnosis code in their record or who have CKD stage 3 or above based on their latest eGFR readings and who may benefit from being excluded from CKD quality indicators

wrongDiagnosisKnown.name: Wrong Diagnosis (Correct Known)
wrongDiagnosisKnown.description: Patients who have CKD stage 3 or above according to their latest eGFR and ACR readings but who have the wrong CKD diagnosis code in their record

WrongDiagnosisUnknown.name: Wrong Diagnosis (Correct Unknown)
WrongDiagnosisUnknown.description: Patients who have CKD stage 3 or above according to their latest eGFR reading and have a CKD diagnosis code in their record but no ACR reading to correctly stage their CKD
